Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the parathyroid hormone family
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Fungi:Alternria alternate, Alternaria cucumerina, Aspergillus niger, Collectotrichum gossypii, Fusarium oxysporum, F. oxysporum subsp melonis, Fusarium moniliforme, Thanatephorus cucumeris, Verticillium dahliae, Pyricularia oryzae Cav..
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has antifungal activity against phytopathogenic fungi. Has no chitinase or agglutination activities.

Literature.Title: Purification and characterization of an ethylene-induced antifungal protein from leaves of Guilder rose (Hydrangea macrophylla).
Literature.Author: Yang Q, Gong ZZ.
